history.empty: There's no history information to display yet.
history.title: History

playerlist.announcement-details: Send an announcement on your channel's chat with the players and Pokémon in each team.
playerlist.details-input: You can add players by asking them to use your command or manually typing the names and presssing Enter.
playerlist.details-swap: You can drag and drop players to swap their positions.
playerlist.title: Players

strategies.all-roles: Guarantee all roles in both teams.
strategies.global-unique-pokemon: Don't repeat Pokémon between both teams.

twitch.details: If you connect to your chat, your viewers will be able to join using your command, e.g. !queue
